statements: SELECT * FROM PatientSymptoms WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientSymptoms WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientSymptoms WHERE symptom LIKE '%fever%'
SELECT * FROM PatientSymptoms WHERE treatment IS NOT NULL
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, symptom, diagnosis FROM PatientSymptoms WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 40
SELECT * FROM PatientSymptoms WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientSymptoms WHERE symptom = 'Fever'
SELECT * FROM PatientSymptoms WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM PatientSymptoms WHERE treatment IS NULL
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM PatientSymptoms WHERE age < 50 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, symptom FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE diagnosis='Cold';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT name, treatment FROM patients LEFT JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE treatment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, name FROM patients WHERE dob < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT patients.name, medical_history.symptom FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE medical_history.diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT DISTINCT patients.gender FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id ORDER BY patients.gender DESC;

SELECT patients.name, medical_history.diagnosis, medical_history.treatment FROM patients LEFT JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE patients.name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, blood_type, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE blood_type = 'O+';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, symptom_description FROM patients JOIN symptoms ON patients.patient_id = symptoms.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, record_date FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors;
SELECT symptom_id, symptom_name, description FROM symptoms;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment, date_recorded FROM medical_history;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, contact_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, date_recorded FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Flu%' ORDER BY date_recorded ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT doctor_name, specialization, count(*) AS total_patients FROM doctors JOIN medical_history ON doctors.doctor_id = medicaljson_history.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name, specialization HAVING count(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_patients DESC;

SELECT symptoms.symptom_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM symptoms JOIN medical_history ON symptoms.symptom_id = medical_history.history_id GROUP BY symptoms.symptom_name ORDER BY total_cases DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalHistory WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT symptom_name, description FROM Symptoms ORDER BY symptom_name ASC
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology'
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, allergies FROM Patients WHERE allergies IS NOT NULL;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;

SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2021-06-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
